title: Executive Order-Suspension of the Writ of Habeas Corpus
content: The military line of the United States for the suppression of the insurrection may be extended so far as Bangor, in Maine. You and any officer acting under your authority are hereby authorized to suspend the writ of habeas corpus in any place between that place and the city of Washington.
citation: Abraham Lincoln, Executive Order-Suspension of the Writ of Habeas Corpus Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/202622
